snippet: Adam Leon explains how he came to make “Gimme the Loot,” a movie about two graffiti writers from the Bronx who want to tag the Mets’ home-run apple.
abstract: Newcomer Adam Leon is garnering wide interest for his debut movie Gimme the Loot, which premiered at 2012 South by Southwest festival; discusses his inspiration for film about two graffiti writers.
lead_paragraph: Adam Leon explains how he came to make “Gimme the Loot,” a movie about two graffiti writers from the Bronx who want to tag the Mets’ home-run apple.

headline.seo: Adam Leon on ‘Gimme the Loot’ and Graffiti Writing
headline.main: What’s Not to Love About Graffiti?
headline.print_headline: What’s Not to Love About Graffiti?

keywords.value: South by Southwest Music and Media Conference
keywords.name: subject
